item.description:
Intuition for Entrepreneurs

“Follow your heart and intuition, they already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.” -Steve Jobs

“Often you have to rely on Intuition.” -Bill Gates

“Trust your instincts. Intuition doesn’t lie. - Oprah Winfrey

"The only real valuable thing is intuition." - Albert Einstein

“There is no prescribed route to follow to arrive at a new idea. You have to make the intuitive leap.” -Stephen Hawking

You commonly hear the phrase “follow your gut” but what does that actually mean and how can you learn to harness it in your daily work? In this intro class we will explore intuition, how it works and practical ways to develop your skills in order to:

  • Make more confident decisions in your business
  • Know the difference between fear, intuition and imagination
  • Lessen risk and minimize impulse decisions
  • Clarify those “gut reactions” and learn to interpret them more clearly
  • Open to more creativity and “inspired” ideas
  • Have more fun and pleasure in experimenting in your business

This experiential workshop is part of the Heart and Soul of Business Series.

“The heart knows what it wants, and it often makes no sense. Intuition, creativity, and listening are all imperative in creating an inspired life -Jonathan H. Ellerby
item.name: Intuition for Entrepreneurs - The Heart and Soul of Business Series
